about_the_game:
Buy the Grim Legends 3: The Dark City Mirror Artbook DLC

The DLC contains an 80 page digital artbook in English showcasing beautiful, hand painted, concept art from Grim Legends 3, with some never before seen pieces together with an in-depth description of the creative process behind the game's development. Visit the monumental city with architecture inspired by the art of Zdzisław Beksiński and the gothic cathedrals of Western Europe. Learn how Shakespeare's story of Romeo and Juliet inspired the premise of the story. A must-have for all fans of the Artifex Mundi games.

Featured Tracks:
01 - Action Theme - 2:04
02 - Calm Dark 1 - 1:36
03 - Calm Dark 2 - 2:24
04 - Calm Dark 3 - 2:08
05 - Gardens - 1:46
06 - Dark Gardens - 1:36
07 - Order Theme - 2:48
08 - Rune Battle - 1:04
09 - Dark Tension - 2:48
10 - Train Theme - 1:36

To access the digital artbook follow these instructions: Right click (or Ctrl + Click if you’re using Mac) Grim Legends 3 in your library. Choose Properties>Local Files>Browse Local Files. Use a pdf reader to open the artbook. Enjoy!
